subtitles:
36204 38830 [ Police Radio Chatter Continues ]
[ Firefighter Radio Chatter]

45880 49132 [ Girl Narrating ]
People once believed
that when someone dies,

49217 52761 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

57141 59643 that a terrible sadness
is carried with it,

65525 69486 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

124959 129504 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

129589 133175 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

137430 140348 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.
140433 142684 All right, guys, let's do it.
147523 149316 They're slacking off from last year.

149400 152194 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.

158242 161578 [ Man ]
I really empathize, but you guys just can't
come in here and take her away like this.
161662 163121 There are procedures to stick by.

163206 165791 You guys should have
cleared this with me first.

166292 168710 Is this the victim?
No, it's Amelia Earhart.

168795 170545 We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.

170630 173799 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

174509 177135 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see
why they took away your gold shield.

177220 179304 I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

181140 183100 - [ Caws ]
- [ Detective ]
All right, clear outta here.

189232 192192 Where's Eric?
Just don't worry about him.

194445 198740 - Tell him to take care of Sarah.
- Look, I will. You just lie back.

212588 216550 Look, your sister-
she's gonna be okay.

216634 220387 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
226936 228728 You lied to her about Eric.
231232 233233 And you're lying to me about Shelly.

273900 277819 [ Sarah Narrating ]
A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

278529 280739 I used to think that was true
about everythingвЂ”

285494 289247 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real,

289332 293752 two people who are meant to be together--
nothing can keep them apart.
332041 333917 What are you, like, the night watchman?

356565 362028 ## [ Radio: Big Band, Swing ]
You know, what this place needs
is a good natural catastrophe.

366909 369869 Come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
369954 372247 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
372331 374291 Hey. Hey, let me do it.

375459 379504 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

381007 382841 Don't cheap out on me.
Lots of onions.

384093 386469 There you go. All right.
[ Skateboard Wheels Clattering ]
393811 395478 How do you steer that on a wet street?

397732 401651 Sarah, she's a genuine "hot dogger."
You hungry?
407408 408950 They make you fart big time.

416917 419586 [ Man ]
You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

419670 422380 [ Lighter Flicks ]
from all the crap
floating around in it.

423549 426676 I wish I could have seen that.
[ Sharp Whistle ]

527111 531072 [ Tires Screeching ]
## [ Man Singing Rock, Indistinct ]

558058 561478 Oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car. Cop car.

568360 571321 [ Tires Screeching ]
Bad people
out on the street tonight.

580039 581956 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

582041 585376 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- [ People Shouting ]

695821 701534 "Abashed, the devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is...
701619 705038 saw virtue in her shape how lovely."

776360 779237 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

780572 782281 [ Man #2 ]
Look at that. Look at that.

783659 788162 Here's to DevilвЂ™s Night,
my new favorite holiday.

791750 793751 You go over there
and tell your pals--

797923 800717 You're out of your
motherfuckin' mind, man.

812646 814856 - [ Gun Cocks ]
- Fuck you, Tin Tin.

822448 828286 Which of you Motor City motherfuckers
wants to bet me this one isn't?
829872 833750 Hey! Fire it up! Fire it up!

833834 838045 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!
843260 845011 Put your guns away, huh, guys?

947865 950199 [ Man ]
#Just paint your face
and shadow smile #
957249 960793 # It doesn't matter how you hide #
961962 964255 # Find you if we're wanting to #

965591 970428 # So slide back down
and close your eyes #

970512 974098 # Sleep a while
You must be tired #
996330 999332 # I dream the crow black dream ##

1007507 1011135 [ Radio: Man Announcing Sports ]
Couple more rings. That's 24k.

1021104 1023898 What is this, Tin TinвЂ”
a bloodstain that's on here?

1026985 1029570 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1029655 1032490 Now, you take it or leave it.
1048632 1050007 Close the gate when you go out!

1050092 1052718 I closes up for you
real good, massa.
1056682 1058849 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.
1063563 1066148 Lucky I don't stab your fat ass.
1088922 1093676 # That point me to another day #

1173048 1175382 What the fuck you all painted up for,
crackhead, huh?
1213463 1216048 I'll kill you! You better go!

1228520 1231355 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!
1231439 1232898 What the fuck you want, man?
1232983 1235442 I want you to tell me a story.

1235527 1237736 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1238864 1241490 You're out of your fucking mind.
Listen!
1254004 1256964 You cut her. You raped her.

1258175 1262052 I shanked her pink ass,
and she loved it!

1274316 1277026 Let me tell you about murder.
It's fun!
1278987 1281739 You gonna learn all about it.
1286578 1289038 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1325825 1331163 # Sometimes it rains inside my head #

1339089 1342049 # Hands are reaching up #
Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
1348598 1350683 # No, they don't have to take you away #

1350767 1353560 I gotta go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1353645 1358190 # No, they don't have to take you away #
1358275 1361610 Get out of my way, you worms!
1363154 1364655 Give me some of that over there!

1366908 1370411 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.
1372330 1375416 Arcade Games fell down, went boom.
1376710 1379336 Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1380213 1384341 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1384467 1387720 Is the man in?
He's taking a meeting.

1430847 1434516 He said,
"Childhood's over the moment
you know you're gonna die."

1458083 1460584 I think we broke her.
[ Sniffs ]
1473139 1477768 # No, they don't have to take you away ##

1485276 1488112 [ Man ]
Hey, kid, get the hell outta the road!
1511136 1513345 I told you to stay out of here.

1513430 1516932 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1519018 1521019 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1526943 1529987 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1535577 1539329 "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
[ Laughing ]
1554345 1556763 Who the fuck is this now?

1563813 1567691 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust-head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1572530 1574781 I'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1575742 1578744 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.

1588046 1593091 "Suddenly I heard a tapping,
as if someone gently rapping,

1602685 1606855 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1609234 1612194 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.
1620411 1624164 Oh, shit. Oh, shit on me!
1625542 1628085 Shit on me. Shit on me!

1635176 1637469 - Mr. Gideon. You're not paying attention.
- [ Gasps ]
1645520 1649439 I repeat. A gold engagement ring, yes?

1650900 1654403 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1658324 1660659 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1667959 1671044 That's Tin Tin,
one of T-bird's little helpers.

1671170 1674214 I think you can rule out
accidental death.
[ Laughs ]

1674299 1677092 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1677176 1681346 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1681431 1686143 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1686227 1688145 I'm supposed to thank you
for that, right?

1688229 1691982 Word to the wise.
Watch your fuckin' mouth.
1693192 1695611 What the hell do you call that?
1699324 1703076 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.

1703161 1705954 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1715673 1718342 - Don't you know this game?
- What game are you talkin' about?
1719260 1721261 Okay, I'll tell you about the rings!

1721346 1724348 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelfthere!

1726434 1729519 Take 'em! Take your fucking rings!
[ Muttering ]

1729604 1731355 And you can choke on them,
you son of a bitch!

1734942 1737527 - Look, it goes up to the attic.
- Okay.

1756297 1758590 [ Shelly's Voice ]
It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1782490 1785409 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1789872 1794209 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of Tin Tin's little party pals.
1794293 1795919 The Pit. They all hang out at the Pit.

1796003 1798463 All of T-bird's little potato-heads
hang out there.

1798548 1801842 Funboy-
he lives there upstairs, all right?

1806764 1809349 - A whole jolly clubвЂ”
- Stop! Please!

1811686 1814312 Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
Hold still!

1816023 1821987 Each one of these is a lifeвЂ”
a life you helped destroy.

1822071 1824656 I'm begging you, all right?
Don't kill me.

1828661 1832664 Your job will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for themвЂ”
1841382 1844134 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1847472 1851600 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1851684 1853351 You're nothing but street grease!
You hear that?

1879670 1882506 It's on the house, kiddo.
You know that.
1890306 1894768 Your mom, technically, she's off right now.

1909659 1911993 I am the police
and I say don't move, Snow White.
1915206 1918875 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1919752 1922212 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1922296 1926633 Then shoot, if you will, Officer Albrecht.

1926717 1929845 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1931722 1934933 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1935017 1938979 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1941858 1945318 I want you to move over to the curb.
Real nice and easy.
1949490 1951157 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1951242 1953243 It's gettin' too friggin' weird for me.
1955913 1958415 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1958499 1961710 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives.

1963087 1966339 - You're the guy that murdered Tin Tin.
- [ Man ] Hey, check it out!

1970219 1972929 He died a year ago--
the moment he touched her.

1975433 1978435 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1984275 1987068 [ Woman Laughing ]
Leave it! Leave it! Run!

1997371 2000081 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell, and...

2000166 2002542 you lose him
right out in the open.

2002627 2007505 Well, at least he didn't do that
"walking against the wind" shit.

2007590 2009883 - I hate that.
- [ Policeman ]
Little early for DevilвЂ™s Night.

2011052 2012302 What the hell
is going on there?

2016807 2019893 Just wish I was
a little hungry again.
That's all.
2019977 2021645 Be careful of what you ask for.
2021729 2023605 Yeah, you may get it. I know.
2035618 2038703 There are energies aligning against you.

2060434 2064312 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.
2064397 2066856 Nobody cleared this little event with me.
2066941 2069526 I didn't have nothing to do with that.

2069610 2072237 I'm sure you must be
awful disappointed.
I got trouble.
2072321 2075615 One of my crew got himself perished.

2075741 2078034 And who might that be?
Tin Tin.

2078119 2082664 Somebody stuck his blades in all
his major organs in alphabetical order.

2082748 2088503 Gentlemen, I think we ought to have
an introspective moment of silence
for poor old Tin Tin.

2091549 2093758 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2098931 2102517 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's burned down.

2103728 2108231 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2109066 2110942 Call it my need to know.

2151484 2154778 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2157239 2159574 He couldn't have stopped.
He was a butt-face.

2163204 2165288 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
2170294 2172420 It's more like sufring than skating.
2172505 2174964 I wish the rain would stop, just once.
2176133 2177592 It can't rain all the time.
2199949 2201199 Are we fighting the good fight?

2210167 2214504 "We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 Caulderon Court Apartments"вЂ”

2216173 2218508 A big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2220177 2222679 She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2222763 2228601 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2228727 2232230 The last time you went
snooping around on a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2232356 2236359 I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
I bet he does.

2244326 2247078 You're gonna wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2249373 2253501 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2286452 2290163 Tomorrow night, we canвЂ”
we can get high...

2290247 2293791 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2300257 2305261 # I am glowing in the dark #

2307932 2312435 - # I am shocked, and I seethe #
- [ Cawing ]

2312519 2317774 - # I don't want to believe no more #
- [ Caws ]
2319401 2321611 There's a big fuckin' bird over there.

2328953 2332538 Come here, bird.
Hey, bird. Hey, bird.

2359900 2364320 Wow, man! Don't do that!
You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!

2371287 2374330 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2383215 2387051 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2389096 2394017 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?

2417583 2421336 Jesus Christ?
Stop me if you heard this one.
2421420 2423671 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2429762 2432555 He hands the innkeeper
three nails, and he asksвЂ”
2436226 2438061 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2443984 2448571 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck, yes, it fuckin' hurts!
2451492 2454869 Look what you've done to my sheets.
2479103 2481104 I've got a gun in my pocket.
2483941 2486818 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2504628 2508464 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2520144 2524689 "Mother" is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2524773 2529527 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2541165 2544750 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2576783 2580536 If I wanted ice, I would have asked for ice!
Now fill it up!
2582956 2584999 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2598263 2600264 You burn yourself playing with matches?

2600349 2602934 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2603018 2605478 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2605562 2608481 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2608565 2611067 Get my friend here a glass of blood.

2666582 2671586 [ Male Reporter On TV ]
You can see I'm here on the corner
of 27th Street and East Washington Place...

2671670 2674964 - the site of last year's biggest
DevilвЂ™s Night conflagration.
- [ Floor Creaks ]

2675048 2677216 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2677301 2680928 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2681013 2683639 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...
2683724 2685725 and cost the lives of two firefighters.

2687644 2690730 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police precinct--

2691648 2695860 [ TV Continues, Indistinct ]
Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2703410 2707121 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2708290 2709457 You still have your hat on.
2739196 2741113 I don't know what I am.

2741198 2743741 I need you to tell me
what happened to us.

2745702 2749872 Well, you took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2749956 2753000 She, uh, was beaten and raped.

2753085 2757672 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2760258 2764804 Shelly Webster held on for 30 hours
in intensive care.
2764888 2767932 Her body finally just gave it up.
2768016 2770893 I saw it, man. I couldn't do jack for her.
2796586 2799755 I saw her through your eyes.
2799840 2802007 You stayed with her the whole time.

2802092 2806262 Yeah, well, you gotta understand
something, all right?

2807597 2812351 I was- I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know,
2812436 2815354 give me something I could work with.
2820235 2822737 Why didn't you do something about it?

2822821 2826115 You think any of those people
in that buildingвЂ” even the
ones who signed the petitionвЂ”
2826199 2827950 would talk after what happened to you?

2833123 2835750 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2841757 2846302 Yeah, weвЂ” Well, not anymore.
We're getting a divorce.

2851099 2854810 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2854895 2857229 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2871286 2875873 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2880962 2883798 Are you gonna vanish
into thin air again?
2887844 2890137 I thought I'd use your front door.

2896228 2899021 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2911326 2913953 [ Gideon ]
I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2914037 2916789 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2916873 2919959 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2922087 2925840 Yeah. I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2925924 2930344 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2937143 2940062 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're gonna do about all this crap!

2940146 2944942 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed away and went swirling.

2949072 2952408 Yeah? And maybe you're not
such a big shot either!

2961459 2963878 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2963962 2965796 Are you tellin' me
this thing is real?

2965881 2969550 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2969634 2973053 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2973930 2977933 You're directly out of your fucking mind!
You know that?

2982939 2985900 It's one of the most important things
I learned from my sister.
2985984 2987610 Sister? She's supposed to be your sister?

2992741 2994450 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?
2996244 2998245 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.
2998330 3001749 With a lot of detail. What do you say?

3001833 3005377 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3005462 3008881 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
3012093 3015012 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.
3016097 3018182 You wanna relax that thing now?

3018266 3022937 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3023021 3027232 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3027317 3030110 I ain't makin' all this up.
3030195 3033364 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.

3058598 3061558 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3070902 3074697 Funboy said he saw a black bird too.
A big one.

3075949 3078075 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.
3079744 3082496 I'll have the janitor come on up.

3147103 3151273 You again.
Are you lost or hungry?
3156488 3158405 # It can't rain all the time #

3172295 3174755 [ T-bird ]
I mean, how many times I gotta tell you?
We're in this together, or we ain't!
3174839 3176924 If one part falls, it all falls!

3178676 3181303 You know how long it took us
to put this together.
[ Skank ] Yeah, a long time.

3181429 3184014 [ T-bird ]
Then that piece of rat shit
made Tin Tin into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

3189312 3193524 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!
3201157 3204159 Probably still... bangin' away on Darla.
3209541 3212626 Smokes and road beers. Be quick.

3220301 3223470 ## [ Background: Greek ]
[ Man Chattering On Phone ]

3245827 3248996 What the fuck
are you supposed to be, man?

3277233 3280485 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3280570 3284531 - Stupid ass-hair! You hit my car!
- [ Groaning ]

3291539 3295959 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

3297587 3300464 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3310850 3313268 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3314854 3316813 - What in the crapвЂ”
- [ Tires Screech ]

3321319 3324029 - Oh, look. Makin' us popular.
- [ Siren Wailing ]

3324113 3326949 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3332497 3335415 This is vehicle 48.
We got us a big old red hot rod.

3341506 3344258 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.
3363903 3365529 Dumb ass! Get outta the way!
3396436 3398478 I hate this. This ain't good.
3421044 3423337 But I don't know-- What? What?

3423421 3426631 Huh? What?
What are you talkin' about?

3428051 3430969 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, I remember her.

3431054 3433055 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3433139 3436433 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3436517 3439978 Then her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3442523 3445359 Who gives a shit?
It's ancient history!

3445443 3448779 What? What do you want?
What is it? What?
3453493 3455410 Did you send us these complaints?

3457080 3460374 - Come here! "Abashed, the devil stood"вЂ”
- [ Screaming ]

3463586 3468298 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

3468383 3472219 I knew I knew you.
But you ain't you.

3472303 3474846 You can't be you.
We put you through the window.

3476808 3479976 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3480061 3482312 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3486943 3489945 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3500123 3502999 and felt how awful goodness is."

3573029 3575322 [ TV: Female Announcer]
This is the 7:00 a.m. edition of Action News.

3575406 3577782 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3577867 3582162 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner cityвЂ” "DevilвЂ™s Night"...

3582246 3585707 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3585791 3591129 Last year, 200 individual blazes were
reported, and 11 people lost their lives.

3591214 3596343 Tonight, we'll be keying on
what may become the biggest
and deadliest DevilвЂ™s Night ever.

3596427 3600055 The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding countiesвЂ”

3600139 3603934 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3605978 3608688 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3614278 3617906 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3617990 3621368 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3622286 3626498 It wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3633381 3637634 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3640555 3644432 Oh, forget it. I never was too good
at this mommy shit.

3669750 3672377 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3672461 3675380 We just fished this out of the river.
He was fused to his own car.
3675464 3677716 We're gonna have to ID his teeth.

3677800 3680885 His name is T-bird.
Arson was his specialty.

3680970 3683680 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3697194 3699904 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right,
3699989 3702782 and you're covering up for somebody.

3702867 3705201 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3705286 3708163 You're the detective.
Why don't you tell me?

3708247 3711291 Okay. Gideon's blows to hell, and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3711375 3714336 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3714420 3716963 Then you steal
one of my case files from Homicide...

3717048 3719341 and you're saying this is just
a fuckin' automobile accident?

3722219 3723845 I didn't want to interrupt you.
